title: Quenched cabbage with smoked gammon
ingredients: ['150g gammon, chopped', 'oil as needed', '1 onion, chopped', '1 carrot, grated', '1 cabbage, shredded', 'water as needed', 'salt and pepper', '1 beef stock cube', '2 tablespoons tomato paste', '2 tablespoons borscht or lemon juice', 'chopped fresh dill']
